Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length outside off, thick outside edge on his poke off the back foot, flies past backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Jayawardene, 2 runs, good length at the pads, it's that old elegant backlift. Comes down at the ball and tucked past short fine
Sohail Tanvir to Jayawardene, no run, good length at off stump, lets it go with the angle
Sohail Tanvir to Jayawardene, 1 run, back of a length in the corridor, pushes it to slip's right with soft hands

Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, FOUR, there's grace at the other end as well! Full at middle, shuffles across slightly, gets his head over the ball, maintains balance and uses his wrists to drive it through wide mid-on
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, no run, good length at middle stump, slight shape back in, offers the full face and pushes to mid-on
Aamer Yamin to Jayawardene, no run, full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Aamer Yamin to Jayawardene, 1 run, back of a length outside off, chops it off the back foot to third man
Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, no run, short and wide, goes for the cut, gets an inside edge and Rizwan stops it diving low to his left
Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, FOUR, back of a length outside off, goes on the back foot and slaps it in front of square
Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length at off stump, whipped behind square on the up
Aamer Yamin to Jayawardene, FOUR, wow. Too easy. Good length outside off, clears the front leg and uses the pace to slice it over point on the up
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, FOUR, back of a length outside off, gets on top of the bounce and punches it between cover and point
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, no run, slower yorker outside off, digs it out
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, 2 runs, back of a length at off stump, shuffles cross and punches of the back foot to deep square's left
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, 1 leg bye, back of a length at middle, shuffles across and turns it to short fine
Sohail Tanvir to Jayawardene, 2 runs, good length at middle, takes a step outside leg, and lifts it over point on the up for third man to run wide and cut off

Sohail Tanvir to Jayawardene, OUT, Rizwan you beauty! Slower ball, good length outside off, he picks it, waits for it and dabs it to the right of Rizwan who puts in a dive to stop the ball. Mahela takes off for a run but is sent back. Can't make it as Rizwan releases immediately and hits the stumps direct from about 15 yards, didn't even take off his gloves for that throw
Narine to Babar Azam, 1 run, full at middle, driven to deep midwicket
Narine to Sangakkara, 1 run, full at off stump, driven all along the ground to a very wide long-off
Narine to Babar Azam, no run, good length, offspinner at off stump, turns back in, inside edge onto the pads and balloons towards the short leg region

Narine to Babar Azam, no run, close! Seam up ball, tails in slightly, goes for the flick down the leg side, Rizwan appeals loudly. There was a sound, but it turns out it was the pad. Good decision not to give that.
Narine to Babar Azam, no run, good length, leg cutter at middle stump, forward defence
Narine to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length at middle stump, clipped through the leg side

Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, no run, this one is even closer! Good length, angled in at off stump, nips back, goes past the inside edge and catches the back pad through to Rizwan. That looked out in real time, but evaded the inside edge. Another good decision
Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length at middle, glanced off the hips through the leg side
Aamer Yamin to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length at middle, defended off the back foot
Aamer Yamin to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length outside off, pushes it on the up to third man
Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, shapes for the pull shot but checks the shot last minute for some reason. Goes in the air but well in front of deep square
Aamer Yamin to Babar Azam, no run, back of a length outside off, driven on the up to covers
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length on the pads, pushed to deep square off the back foot
Mohammad Irfan to Babar Azam, FOUR, fulll at middle stump, stays put and lifts this over midwicket with no effort
Mohammad Irfan to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, dropped in front of short fine off the hips
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, dabbed to point
Mohammad Irfan to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length outside off, pushed straight to point
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, no run, good length at middle stump, forward defence
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, FOUR, full at off stump, goes inside-out and just flies past McCullum at cover who has stretched and dived about 5000 yards to his right in a half a second
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length at middle stump, pushed to deep square
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, no run, good length outside off, front foot defence
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, no run, tossed up at off stump, flicked straight to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length at middle, pushed to deep square off the back foot
Narine to Sangakkara, no run, good length outside off, cut straight to point
Narine to Sangakkara, no run, <>ooo! Flighted at middle stump, draws him forward, beats him in flight and turn. flies past his outside edge
Narine to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
Narine to Babar Azam, 1 run, short at middle stump, pushed to deep square
Narine to Sangakkara, no run, good length outside off, this time he lets it spin by and lets it go
Narine to Sangakkara, 2 runs, full at off stump, cover drive, Baz puts in another dive there but he wasn't very close, sweeper has to run to his left
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, 1 run, full at middle stump, backs away to drive it to long-off
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, flighted at off stump, goes down the track and drives to long-on
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, no run, good length at off stump, steps out and pushes back to the bowler
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, pulled wide of long-on
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length outside off, steps out, not to the pitch, wants to tuck it through midwicket, closes the face too early and gets a leading edge that flies over the bowler
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, 1 run, full at leg stump, punched to long-on
Elliott to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length at off stump, shuffles across and punches on the up to deep midwicket
Elliott to Sangakkara, FOUR, full toss at the pads, gets low and lifts it over short fine
Elliott to Sangakkara, FOUR, short and wide, hangs back and cuts it between backward point and short third man
Elliott to Sangakkara, 1 run, full outside off, whipped into the leg side, wide of long-on
Elliott to Babar Azam, no run, slower ball, good length at leg stump, gets on one knee to ramp it fine, it flies over leg stump
Elliott to Babar Azam, FOUR, good length outside off, shapes up and slogs it past deep midwicket's left
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length at middle, gets slow and middles the sweep nicely, one bounce to long leg

Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, FOUR, looped at off stump, he thought it would be fuller, goes inside-out to pick the cover boundary, doesn't get to the pitch and gets a thick outside edge that flies past sweep
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, no run, good length at off stump, steps out and yorks himself
Yasir Shah to Babar Azam, 1 run, another loopy ball at leg stump, not to the pitch once again, closes the face early and leading edge goes above Yasir
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, no run, good length at off stump, taps it back to the bowler

Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, no run, Sanga is also beaten in flight. Steps out and has to get his pad across to cover the line of this good length ball. Gets an inside edge onto pad and it lands safely between bowler and midwicket who converge
Narine to Babar Azam, 1 run, short and wide, cut straight to deep cover

Narine to Sangakkara, OUT, short and wide, he's making room but the ball is spinning away and out of his reach. Tries to hit the cut too hard, gets a top edge and point gets under it and takes it easily
Narine to Babar Azam, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, late cut dabbed past first slip
Wicket: ['KC Sangakkara c Aamer Yamin b Narine 20 (23b 2x4 0x6) SR: 86.95']

Commentary: Narine to Babar Azam, no run, this one comes back in and gets an inside edge onto pad on the attempted late cut
Narine to Babar Azam, no run, good length at off stump, defended off the back foot
Narine to Babar Azam, no run, good length at leg stump, raps the pads, bobs up and they appeal for a catch after Rizwan takes it, no bat
Fakhar Zaman to Shoaib Malik, no run, short and past the wide marker...not given
Fakhar Zaman to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, good length outside off, dropped into the off side off the back foot
Fakhar Zaman to Babar Azam, OUT, good length outside off, no feet, throws his hands at it on the up and goes for the extravagant...but it's gone high, not far, and straight to long-off
Fakhar Zaman to Shoaib Malik, no run, good length outside off, angles in and turns away sharply to beat the outside edge
Fakhar Zaman to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, back of a length outside off, angled in and turns away again. Why are they playing across? This time he just about manages to push it to long-on against the turn
Wicket: ['Babar Azam c Umar Akmal b Fakhar Zaman 49 (42b 7x4 0x6) SR: 116.66']

Commentary: Fakhar Zaman to Bopara, 1 run, good length at off stump, driven to long-off
Yasir Shah to Bopara, 1 run, full at off stump, driven to sweeper cover
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, no run, good length at leg stump, tries to turn it into the leg side, leading edge back to the bowler

Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, pushed to point who has a shy and get a direct hit...third umpire has been called for. He's well in. They got an extra run off the ricochet as well

Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, OUT, good length at off stump, dropped into the off side towards short third man off the back foot, this time Bopara is sent back and the direct hit catches him short! Gohar, the substitute fielder. No need of a third umpire this time. Brilliant fielding. It was Bopara's call and he ran, but Malik wasn't looking or listening
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, no run, short and wide, chopped to point
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, no run, good length at middle stump, front foot defence
McCullum to Imad Wasim, FOUR, one step, two step, seam up, short ball, down the leg, lifts it easily over short fine
McCullum to Imad Wasim, no run, tosses up an offspinner, slow at middle stump, driven back to him
McCullum to Imad Wasim, no run, floated at middle stump, really slow, inside edge onto pad off the attempted slog
McCullum to Imad Wasim, 1 run, dropped short outside off, goes across, gets the toe end of the bat as he pulls it over the bowler
McCullum to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, full at off stump, driven to long-off
McCullum to Imad Wasim, SIX, tossed up nicely on leg stump, this time he waits for it, gets under it and slams it high into the sky and past the long-on boundary
Narine to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, pushed off the back foot to short third man

Narine to Imad Wasim, OUT, good length, fired down the leg side, he's used the reverse sweep to drag it out to point...direct hit! There was good bat on that reverse sweep, so it flew to the fielder - Yamin - and he caught and released it in no time to destroy the stumps. Malik hadn't even started his despairing dive as it crashed into the stumps
Narine to Pollard, 1 run, full at off stump, driven to long-on
Narine to Imad Wasim, no run, full at middle stump, driven back to the bowler
Narine to Imad Wasim, no run, good length at off, spins away as he tries to whip it across the line, checks his shot and taps it back to the bowler
Narine to Imad Wasim, FOUR, good length outside off, goes with the turn and slaps it on the up over extra cover. Gorgeous
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 1 run, full outside off, stays in the crease, goes inside out and lifts it on the bounce to long-off
Sohail Tanvir to Imad Wasim, 1 run, yorker at middle stump, slammed down to long-on
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 1 run, full on the pads, flicked out to deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Imad Wasim, 1 run, slower ball, back of a length at the legs, turned away to deep square leg's left
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, SIX, slam! Floats up a slower ball outside off, he waits for it and lifts it over long-on. Too easy for him. Too easy.
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 1 run, Strong comeback. Yorker at leg stump, tries to flick it, leading edge to point who almost over runs it but manages to retain balance in the end

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, 2 runs, is that another run out?! Yorker on the boots, flicks it to deep midwicket's right...he runs in, picks up and throws in on the bounce right next to the stumps...but the big man and his big stride have made it past the crease
Aamer Yamin to Pollard, 1 run, good length outside off, right in the crunching zone, he crunches alright. But it hits the bottom and bounces over McCullum and straight to long-off
Aamer Yamin to Imad Wasim, 1 run, low full toss at off stump, slices it straight to extra cover

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, FOUR, is this his night? full at off stump, it's almost like he knows where it's coming. Hangs back, no feet, full face and lifts it over the bowler who has only slightly missed the length there

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, no run, goes for the bouncer, it's slightly down the leg side, he's missed the pull and is furious with the umpire. He wants a wide. The rules state he isn't right to question the umpire, but outside of the law, everybody sympathizes with Pollard. That was well wide.
Aamer Yamin to Pollard, 1 run, yorker outside off, jammed out to long-off
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 1 run, he would've got a wide for this one but he got bat on it. Full toss and well wide, bowled from around the wicket. He can only get the bottom of the bat to long-off

Sohail Tanvir to Imad Wasim, 1 bye, over the wicket, good length outside off, he walks across the stumps to ramp it over short fine, Rizwan moved slightly to his right and had to fall down to stop the ball. Lost time as a result and couldn't get the throw in as they ran past
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, SIX, that's not where to bowl! Overpitched outside off, stands tall and hits yet another one straight over the bowler. Bad length to bowl to Pollard
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, no run, that's more like it. In the blockhole, wide of off stump, tries to chop it to the off side, beaten

Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 2 runs, full toss on the pads, whips it past square leg who is inside the circle, deep midwicket comes across but Pollard wants that second more than he wants anything and scampers back easily

Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 3 runs, low full toss outside off, swings away slightly and gets the outside edge on his closed face. It flies over extra cover, to long-off where Akmal runs across to his left, gets down to it and tries to pull out some flair as he does a no-see flick to McCullum who ran back form extra cover...it lands wide of McCullum and they come back for a three for Pollard to keep strike

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, 2 runs, full outside off, slaps it flat to long-off's left. It's McCullum there this time and he moves nimbly and pushes it back into the ground as his feet shadow the boundary. Great fielding
Aamer Yamin to Pollard, 1 run, goes for the bouncer, misses it by some way. Short at middle, he swivels and pummels the pull shot straight to deep square. Pollard is disappointed

Aamer Yamin to Imad Wasim, 1 run, full outside off, Pollard has taken off for the run before the ball reaches the other end. Cover drive goes straight to extra cover. Once again, mid-off was in and he's lucky to get away

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, no run, yorker outside off, Amir has run off like a mad man in celebration. That was baffling. He only turns around and remembers to appeal after he reaches Pollard at the other end. He's just about nailed it inside the wide marker. Pollard has hit the ground with the bat. No edge. Not out.

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, SIX, smashed away! They keep feeding him these overpitched balls outside off, he keeps dispatching them! He knew where it was coming, he held his shape and drilled it to McCullum's left at long-off

Aamer Yamin to Pollard, SIX, he's done it! Overpitched and angled into the pads, he stands tall and whips it with all the Carribbean flair he can muster, watches it sail over the square leg boundary, throws the bat away, throws the helmet away, drops to the floor and does spontaneous push-ups!
